title: PlantIdentifier
body: My first big project. Initially created in Python, this slow and tedious version transformed into the snappy web app accessible at plants.simokapi.com.

title: First place winner of the 2025 Hackhealth hackathon
body: Two of my friends and I won first place in the hackathon, after presenting a product automating certain processes for medical staff and making the patient data monitoring more efficient.

title: Java Rasterizer
body: Created using plain Java, the calculations required to bring this to reality were done by me. The project takes an ASCII encoded STL file and transforms, projects and renders a 3D model. Full code can be found on my [GitHub](https://github.com/SimoKapi)

title: DropStorage
body: One of my most favorite projects. I created my own cloud storage service, running on my server. It consists of two projects - a web hosted UI interface, which places API calls to a server-side RESTful API script. Accessible at [storage.simokapi.com](https://storage.simokapi.com)

title: ScreenBlocker
body:
I took my first shot at vibe coding and created a MacOS app that allows the computer to display an image and subsequently locks the screen if any part of the Mac is clicked. 



 A few limitations: does not overlay fullscreen windows, only sends screen to the screen saver (you can set your computer to lock after screen saver)
